Text: The Old Allamakee County Courthouse, located on 2nd Street in Lansing, is a short-lived former county courthouse of Allamakee County, Iowa.

Text: Old Allamakee County Courthouse (Lansing, Iowa):  Waukon built its own courthouse in the meantime, but it failed to win back the county seat in yet another vote in 1864.
Triplets:<Old Allamakee County Courthouse
4:
--------------------
<Text: Old Allamakee County Courthouse (Lansing, Iowa):  The county sheriff, a Waukon resident, attempted to seize the county's records from the Lansing courthouse in 1866; however, a posse from Lansing stopped him before he could return to Waukon.>
Triplets:<Old Allamakee County Courthouse
5:
--------------------
Text: Old Allamakee County Courthouse (Lansing, Iowa):  The Iowa Supreme Court decided the county seat battle in favor of Waukon the following year; it has remained there since.

Triplets:<Old Allamakee County Courthouse
